original_title: Fidelandia: Behind the Curtain of Cuban's Revolution
overview: There was a historical reason for the Cuban revolution. After all these years, there might be some who still think it a great thing, but it doesn't work for everyone. This film is the story of those people who it doesn't work for. The youth fights for an opportunity to experience "Western freedom", the elderly express their sadness, anger, frustrations, and hopes of a Cuba they fear will never come.
title: Fidelandia: Behind the Curtain of Cuban's Revolution
